questions.title:
I am the first woman to win a Nobel
Prize in 1911...
questions.bio:
Physicist and chemist
She discovered radioactivity and invented
a mobile X-ray unit that was used during World War I.

questions.title:
Watson and Crick discovered
the molecular structure of DNA because of some pictures I took...
questions.bio:
***Chemist
She took the first picture
of DNA using X-ray crystallography.
This lead to the discovery the
double helix.
